item.title: Hm. I sure need help please lol
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:13, topic:324896”]if (NPCID == 1528) toX = 3020; toY = 4815; sM("Welcome to Jail."); }

That code was a fail.

  1. Conventions
  2. Missing bracket

He’s needing help for teleporting from objects.[/quote]

I know the conventions were failed, I’m on my iPhone as stated before, so conventions are kinda hard. I said IF that code doesn’t work. And I posted the one WITH a bracket. If he wants teleporting from objects then he can change if (NPCID == 1528) to if (objectID == ####) and add under the other if (objectID ==
and search makeGlobalObject in client.java and add it with the others.

Read full topic

item.title: Hm. I sure need help please lol

item.description:
@crimsonbow13 wrote:

Naw, I didnt want it like that. I wanted it so it was a menu like 1st page “Visit the Jail?”
2nd page “Yes”
“no”

I got something done that works fine. I made so a dif npc tele’s people to abyss. And I got this working so im good. Thanks for your help my friend

item.title: Hm. I sure need help please lol
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

crimsonbow13:

I tried putting another under it, but it doesnt let me. So instead, how do you make an object tele you somewhere? Like by clicking it?

in client.java search for if (NPCID == and under the last ‘}’ add if (NPCID == 1528) { toX = 3020; toY = 4815; sM("Welcome to Jail."); }

That should work.

If it doesn’t try if (NPCID == 1528) toX = 3020; toY = 4815; sM("Welcome to Jail."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Hm. I sure need help please lol
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“crimsonbow13, post:1, topic:324896”]I made an NPC, when I click it, it says “Visit the Prisoners?”(because I made a tele there so people can talk with jailed people.)
But when I click ‘Yes’ it teleports me to the abyss because copy and pasted the abyss teleport as so:

if(NPCID == 1528){
teleEffect = 2;
sendQuest(“Would you like to visit The Prison?”, 2470);
sendQuest(“Yes”, 2471);
sendQuest(“No”, 2472);
sendQuest("", 2473);
sendFrame164(2469);
}

I don’t know how to change the coords hitting yes makes me go to, because it was originally:

if(q2 == 15){
teleEffect = 2;
sendQuest(“Teleport to the abyss?”, 2470);
sendQuest(“Yes”, 2471);
sendQuest(“No”, 2472);
sendQuest("", 2473);
sendFrame164(2469);
}

Anybody got any ideas?[/quote]

Search for 2469. And see if there are coords that match the ones it teles you to.

Read full topic
item.source: Hm. I sure need help please lol

item.title: Hm. I sure need help please lol
item.dc:creator: @crimsonbow13 crimsonbow13
item.description:
@crimsonbow13 wrote:

I made an NPC, when I click it, it says “Visit the Prisoners?”(because I made a tele there so people can talk with jailed people.)
But when I click ‘Yes’ it teleports me to the abyss because copy and pasted the abyss teleport as so:

if(NPCID == 1528){
teleEffect = 2;
sendQuest(“Would you like to visit The Prison?”, 2470);
sendQuest(“Yes”, 2471);
sendQuest(“No”, 2472);
sendQuest("", 2473);
sendFrame164(2469);
}

I don’t know how to change the coords hitting yes makes me go to, because it was originally:

if(q2 == 15){
teleEffect = 2;
sendQuest(“Teleport to the abyss?”, 2470);
sendQuest(“Yes”, 2471);
sendQuest(“No”, 2472);
sendQuest("", 2473);
sendFrame164(2469);
}

Anybody got any ideas?

Read full topic
